title: Ricki Lake says ex-husband who killed himself helped her find love again
text:

Ricki Lake believes that her ex-husband who killed himself in 2017 helped her find love again.

The talk show host and X Factor : Celebrity star was married to Christian Evans from 2012 to 2015.

Two years after they split, he tragically took his own life at the age of 45.

But the star, 51, believes he helped her find love again by sending her new partner Jeffrey Scult to her.

Speaking on today's Loose Women, she told the panel: "I do [believe that], I absolutely believe it because they are very similar.

"I definitely have a type but I do believe he wants me to find love again he doesn’t want me alone, I want to believe he had a hand in introducing me.

(Image: Matt Baron/BEI / Rex Features)

"He helped me to meet this new love in my life - not so new, our one year anniversary is next week."

Ricki remained close friends with her ex-husband after their break-up and she says talking about him helps her heal.

She said: "It's healing for me to share my story, as painful as it is. All of us experience mental illness - one in two of us is going to suffer from mental illness breakdown.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

"My husband suffered from bipolar disorder, when we fell in love I didn't know. I don’t want him to have died in vain.

"I want my story to help others and I have been pretty outspoken. I know he's proud of me I know he's with me."

Ricki wants to help others going through something similar by speaking about her loss, but admits it's something she'll never get over.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX)

"I don’t think I’ll ever get over him, losing someone like that, and we had plans we had bought a home together we were planning to buy a place in Ibiza," she said.

description: The talk show host and X Factor: Celebrity star spoke openly about her former partner's tragic death on today's Loose Women
